<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/babylon/btclightclient/v1/containsBytes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



ContainsBytes is a temporary method that
checks whether a hash is maintained by the module.
See discussion at https://github.com/babylonlabs-io/babylon/pull/132
for more details.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"hash","required":false,"schema":{"format":"byte","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
